message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the product, $110 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $105.  Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can see you're interested in the product, so I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $108, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that.
